title: Lindy Klim poses with her stunning lookalike daughter Stella for Melbourne Cup launch
text:
Lindy Klim is a successful model, social media influencer and businesswoman.

And it appears that her daughter Stella, 13, is closely following in her mother's footsteps.

The teen joined her youthful 42-year-old mum for a photoshoot at a launch event of the 2019 Melbourne Cup Carnival, held at Flemington Racecourse in Melbourne on Monday.

The apple doesn't fall far from the tree! Lindy Klim and her teenage daughter Stella, 13, pose in a photoshoot at a launch event of the 2019 Melbourne Cup Carnival, held at Flemington Racecourse in Melbourne on Monday

The duo both looked gorgeous in Fendi frocks, with Lindy pretty in pink and Stella standing out in emerald green.

Lindy, 41, gave her sheer baby pink dress from the famed Italian fashion house an edge, by pairing it with knee-high white leather boots and a matching clutch.

Meanwhile, budding model Stella boosted her height with baby blue strappy stilettos.

The mother and daughter duo both wore stylish headbands in their brunette locks.

Pretty: The duo both looked gorgeous in Fendi frocks, with Lindy pretty in pink and Stella standing out in emerald green

Cute: Lindy pretended to tell her daughter off for being on the phone in one of the photos from the shoot

Earlier this year, Lindy shared her thoughts about Stella's interest in becoming a model.

Speaking to The Daily Telegraph, the ex-wife of Michael Klim said she doesn't want the former couple's daughter to be 'burnt out' in just a year.

Lindy explained to the paper that she's keeping a watchful eye, with modelling and social media agencies keen to sign on the teen.

Concerns: Earlier this year, Lindy shared her thoughts about Stella's interest in becoming a model. Speaking to The Daily Telegraph, the ex-wife of Michael Klim said she doesn't want the former couple's daughter to be 'burnt out' in just a year

'It is kind of a weird area this whole social media modelling thing for Stella,' she said.

And while she's happy for Stella to become involved in 'surfing campaigns' and a 'few little things', she doesn't want her to be 'burnt out by the age of 14'.

Lindy shares Stella with ex-husband, Olympic Swimmer Michael Klim, along with son Rocco, 10, and daughter Frankie, seven.

Meanwhile, Lindy also shared her thoughts on horse racing protesters and their right to demonstrate their feelings ahead of the Melbourne Cup.

In an interview with Who magazine last Thursday, the mother-of-four explained that activists can protest the races - 'just as long nobody throws paint on me – then that’s a problem'.

'They can protest, just as long as nobody throws paint on me!' Lindy recently shared her thoughts on horse racing protesters and their right to demonstrate their feelings ahead of the Melbourne Cup

She said: 'I don’t promote animal cruelty or anything like that, but I do think these animals are very well looked after and very well cared for.'

'Obviously people have their own opinions and they’re allowed to have their own opinions.

'I’m not going to stop anyone from having their own beliefs or whatever. They can protest, just as long nobody throws paint on me – then that’s a problem,' Lindy quipped.
description: Lindy Klim is a successful model, social media influencer and businesswoman.
